title: Livestream alret: Programming Prep Guide for the CSAI Entrance Test
description: Want to study computer science in Europe? Enroll in the Computer Science and AI bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos. Exclusive JetBrains scholarships are up for grabs! Join us on February 11, at 4:00 pm UTC, for a special preparation session to help you ace the entrance test for this program. You’ll get first-hand tips […]
author: Alena Gupaisova
excerpt: Join us on February 11, at 4:00 pm UTC, for a special preparation session to help you ace the Computer Science and AI BSc entrance test and earn a JetBrains scholarship.
text: The place for learning and teaching computer science your way JetBrains Academy Offline ProgramsLivestream alret: Programming Prep Guide for the CSAI Entrance Test Want to study computer science in Europe? Enroll in the Computer Science and AI bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos. Exclusive JetBrains scholarships are up for grabs! Join us on February 11, at 4:00 pm UTC, for a special preparation session to help you ace the entrance test for this program. You’ll get first-hand tips from JetBrains Researcher Pavel Mavrin (known within the Codeforces community as pashka). An expert in algorithms and data structures, Pavel has participated in many programming competitions and was the ICPC World Champion in 2004. Subscribe to JetBrains Academy updates Discover more
html:
The place for learning and teaching computer science your way

JetBrains Academy Offline Programs

Livestream alret: Programming Prep Guide for the CSAI Entrance Test

Want to study computer science in Europe? Enroll in the Computer Science and AI bachelor’s program at Neapolis University Pafos. Exclusive JetBrains scholarships are up for grabs!

Join us on February 11, at 4:00 pm UTC, for a special preparation session to help you ace the entrance test for this program. You’ll get first-hand tips from JetBrains Researcher Pavel Mavrin (known within the Codeforces community as pashka). An expert in algorithms and data structures, Pavel has participated in many programming competitions and was the ICPC World Champion in 2004.

Subscribe to JetBrains Academy updates

Discover more
